name: Horizon (itch) (Josiah8898) (Josiah8898)
description:
Horizon

Welcome to HORIZON, a mania-style rhythm game with a twist!

Play testers needed!

Key Features

  • 6 button rhythm game where the notes don't scroll, but the judgment line does!
  • 3 original songs
  • 2 difficulty levels per song
  • Leaderboards on every song and difficulty

Controls

  • Use the mouse to navigate through menus
  • Press Esc to back out of a menu or quit a song
  • Press SDFJKL to hit notes on that key's respective lane when the judgment line passes over a note
  • Additionally, pressing QWEIOP does the same

Credits

  • Programming: rollingcrow
  • Music: Jack Luxon, Narasu, TENCONCRETECUBES
  • Art: TENCONCRETECUBES, Kenney, patchakorn phom-in
  • Fonts: Solid Snake's Game Shrine
  • Tools used: Unity, Audacity, Cubase, FL Studio, Paint.net
